data.name: 0000 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me.

data.name: 0001 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I came to the staff room to borrow the music room key.

data.name: 0002 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I get captured by the likes of Mr. Okabe this whole situation will get needlessly complex.

data.name: 0003 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And I'd rather like to get in and out as quick as possible…

data.name: 0004 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? What's that? A music writing contest?

data.name: 0005 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I had no idea there was anything like that going on.

data.name: 0006 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: More importantly--How's anyone supposed to see a poster put up in the staff room?

data.name: 0007 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Are they even trying?

data.name: 0008 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess while I'm here for the key, I'll also ask about the contest.

data.name: 0009 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… I see--Thank you very much.

data.name: 0010 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After teachers continued to relinquish their responsibility for me one after another…

data.name: 0011 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...I somehow eventually managed to get the key without incident.

data.name: 0012 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They were certainly suspicious that the SOS Brigade was up to something again...

data.name: 0013 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's sad that I can't deny it at all. The teacher's inference was a magnificent bulls-eye.

data.name: 0014 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While I was at it, I went around asking if any past students signed up for the contest...

data.name: 0015 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...but I quite magnificently got zero.

data.name: 0016 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They'd just tell me there was no student who ever did.

data.name: 0017 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's a perfect explanation for Haruhi, right?

data.name: 0018 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If a student like that never existed then neither can their ghost.

data.name: 0019 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll take the wind ensemble club's alumni list and show it to her for good measure.

data.name: 0020 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely even Haruhi would have nothing to complain about.

data.name: 0021 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Our SOS Brigade simply has no reputation is all.

data.name: 0022 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we push our luck and the key to the music room is confiscated we're back to square one.

data.name: 0023 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then--Let's see what I can do…

data.name: 0024 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Prepared for rejection, I tried asking the band's advisor.

data.name: 0025 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surprisingly, I was allowed to borrow the band's "#P05alumni list#P01."

data.name: 0026 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess it was one of those "fear exaggerates danger" situations.

data.name: 0027 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd better not do anything unnecessary.

data.name: 0028 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Otherwise I'll be found out when I'm asked why I have the list.

data.name: 0029 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll take Haruhi's summer school schedule or something to cover it up.

data.name: 0030 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Although I don't see how this is going to make them give up their ridiculous training camp.

data.name: 0031 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It might give us something to talk about at least.

data.name: 0032 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't have a reason to be in the staff room anymore but…

data.name: 0033 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm interested in that song writing recruitment poster I saw earlier.

data.name: 0034 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Think about it...

data.name: 0035 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the past there was no one who wanted to enter the contest.

data.name: 0036 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Which means this mystery girl Haruhi talks about can't be a ghost.

data.name: 0037 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's enough for now.

data.name: 0038 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But then, what was that piano sound about…

data.name: 0039 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ultimately, with that part of the story unsolved we're basically back where we started.

data.name: 0040 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A song-writing contest, huh…

data.name: 0041 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that case, there must be students who want to apply for this years contest.

data.name: 0042 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe they made the sound?

data.name: 0043 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A student was practicing on the piano, therefore the ghost doesn't exist.

data.name: 0044 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's a perfect plan. Or so I thought.

data.name: 0045 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn, the application deadline has already passed…

data.name: 0046 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Logically, figuring that out now wasn't very smart.

data.name: 0047 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Should I take the poster with me?

data.name: 0048 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I got the teacher I talked with earlier to willingly give me the "#P05Poster#P01."

data.name: 0049 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It makes sense, the deadline passed ages ago so why wouldn't they.

data.name: 0050 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Anyway, I hope I can manage to convince Haruhi with this.

data.name: 0051 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's not think about what happens if I can't.

data.name: 0052 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Despite her appearance, Haruhi is pretty perceptive.

data.name: 0053 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It could end up being like poking a bush with a stick and then a snake comes out.

data.name: 0054 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While being told about the posters' deadline date,

data.name: 0055 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The teacher gave me a "#P05Physical Examination Notice#P01." Is this supposed to be some kind of thanks?

data.name: 0056 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm having a hard time understanding this.

data.name: 0057 (407.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Looks like I won't be coming here anymore.

data.name: 0058 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I need to convince Haruhi with this.

data.name: 0059 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While also trying to find out the truth of what happened.

data.name: 0060 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's extremely worrying but I have no other choice.

data.name: 0061 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is the limit of what an ordinary person like me can do.

data.name: 0062 (407.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now let's hope everyone else does the same.

data.name: 0063 (407.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Take the Alumni List

data.name: 0064 (407.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Don't take the Alumni List

data.name: 0065 (407.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Take it with you

data.name: 0066 (407.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Don't take it with you
